short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is requesting for 2 Vector Network Analyzers (or equivalent) with multiple accessories
description: The RCMP is requiring the purchase of 2 Vector Network Analyzers (or equivalent), with 2 ports and multiple other accessories, in order to fulfill their requirements for analyzing electronic signals.
duration_in_months: We are planning to execute this contract for a period of six (6) months
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Vector Network Analyzers (or Equivalent) – Solicitation 202301887

## Brief Notice

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for the supply of Vector Network Analyzers (or equivalent products) to support their operational requirements. This solicitation is open only to members of the Supplier Adhesion Program (SAP) E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN, qualified under Stream 2: Electronic Products.

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 202301887
* Publication Date: August 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 6, 2023 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 11, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

## Products and Services Required

The RCMP requires the following products and services:
* 2 Vector Network Analyzers with 2 ports, 5 kHz to 3 GHz, N(f) connectors
* 2 options for Spectrum Analyzers
* 2 DC power supplies for 12/4V supply voltage
* Plug-in units
* 2 Li-Ion battery packs for internal battery slots
* 2 Distance to Fault measurements
* 2 transport bags
* 2 H-style shoulder harnesses for portable operation with optional battery packs
* 2 spare battery packs
* 4 RF cables (50 Ohm; N(m) to N(m); DC to 18GHz)

## Notice and Evaluation

* The tender will be evaluated on a “Lowest Price” basis
* The best-value proposal, taking into account the price and other evaluation criteria, will be selected
* Proposals must be submitted to the RCMP Procurement Officer by email
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement

## Contact Information

For all technical and contractual inquiries, please contact:
Olivia McCarthy, Procurement and Contracting
Phone: (343) 574-7219
Email: Olivia.McCarthy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

## Publication and Notification

The National Procurement Plan is available on the RCMP website at [www.rcmp-grc.gc.ca](http://www.rcmp-grc.gc.ca). Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GET
